lines.value: yonetmenin bir cekimi bitirmek icin kullandigi bir fiil kes - i̇ngilizce cut kelimesi teknik olarak filmlerde hem iki sahne arasindaki kesme hem de bitirme islemini belirten kesme olarak kullanilir ; cn olabilecegi gibi bir film bandi ya da iki ayri cekim arasindaki baglanti anlaminda bir isim de olabilir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: ayni zamanda bir filmin farkli safhalardaki bir versiyonu da olabilir taslak kurgusu yonetmenin kurgusu final kurgusu
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: bu makale cercevesinde kesme cekimler sirasinda olmasa bile gosterim esnasinda birbirinden ayri iki cekimin birbirlerini kesintisiz takip edecek sekilde birlestirilmesi anlaminda kullanilmistir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: bes basit kurgu turu vardir duz zit paralel capraz atlama ve bicim kurgusu

lines.value: zit kurguda ise birbirini takip eden goruntuler dogal olarak birbirinden ayridirlar ornegin slaves herbert j biberman 1969 filminde kolelerin kelepceli ayaklarindan dortnala giden atlarin toynaklarina yapilan kesme esir ile ozgur kavramlari arasindaki zitligi belirtir

lines.value: c# si sarp seklinde telaffuz edilir microsoft'un gelistirmis oldugu yeni nesil programlama dilidir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: yine microsoft tarafindan gelistirilmis net teknolojisi icin gelistirilmis dillerden biridir

lines.value: microsoft tarafindan gelistirilmis olsa da ecma ve iso standartlari altina alinmistir

lines.value: [[c|c programlama dili]]nde bir tam sayi degiskeni 1 atirmak icin ++ soneki kullanilir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: c++ dili adini c diliyle nesneye yonelimli programlama yapabilmek icin eklentiler c with classes almistir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: benzer sekilde c++ diline yeni eklentiler yapilarak c++)++ bir adim daha ileriye goturulmus ve tamamen nesneye yonelik tasarlanmis c# dilinin isimlendirilmesinde + karakterlerinin birbirlerine yakinlasmis hali ve bir melodi anahtari olan c# major kullanilmistir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: bu dilin tasarlanmasina pascal delphi derleyicileri ve j++ programlama dilinin tasarimlariyla bilinen anders hejlsberg liderlik etmistir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: bircok alanda java'yi kendisine ornek alir ve c# da java gibi c ve c++ kod sozdizimine benzer bir kod yapisindadir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: net kutuphanelerini kullanmak amaciyla yazilan programlarin calistigi bilgisayarlarda uyumlu bir kutuphanenin ve yorumlayicinin bulunmasi gereklidir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: scada terimi i̇ngilizce supervisory control and data acquisition kelimelerinin ilk harflerinin okunmasi ile olusturulan bir kisaltmadir.kapsamli ve entegre bir veri tabanli kontrol ve izleme sistemi olan scada ile bir tesise veya isletmeye ait tum ekipmanlarin kontrolunden uretim planlamasina cevre kontrol unitelerinden yardimci isletmelere kadar tum birimlerin otomatik kontrolu gozetlenmesi ve sonuclarin raporlanmasi saglanabilir.temel olarak scada yazilimindan izleme kontrol veri toplama verilerin kaydi ve saklanmasi islevlerini gerceklestirmesi beklenmektedir.scada sistemleri endustriyel proseslerde imalat uretim enerji uretimi imalat ve rafinerilerde surekli,kesintili tekrarlayan ya da ayrik modlarda calisabilir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: altyapi islemleri kamu veya ozel sektorlerde su aritma ve terfi merkezlerinde atiksu aritma petrol ve gaz boru hatlari elektrik iletim ve dagitim ruzgar jenaratorleri sivil savunma siren sistemleri ve buyuk iletisim sistemlerini icerebilir.tesis binalari havaalanlari gemiler ve uzay istasyonlari da dahil olmak uzere kamu ve ozel tesisleri kapsayabilir

lines.value: isitma ve havalandirma sistemlerinde hvac erisim ve enerji tuketimini kontrol ve izleme gerekebilir.scada sagladigi maksimum fayda ,guvenlik ve kolaylik bakimindan endustri tesislerinin en buyuk ihtiyaclarindan olmaya devam edecektir

lines.value: ulrich iki kere evlenmistir.i̇lk evliligi tur esnasinda tanistigi bir kadin olan debbie jones ile 1988 yilinda gerceklesmistir.fakat 1990 yilinda the black album kayitlari sirasinda ulrich'in yogunlugu sebebiyle bosanmislardir.i̇kinci evliligi ise 1997-2004 yillari arasinda bir acil tip doktoru olan skylar satenstein ile gerceklesmistir.myles ve layne adinda iki cocuklari olmustur.myles babasinin izinden gidip bateriye ilgi duymaya baslamistir.my missing half adli grupta calmaktadir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: ulrich 2004 yilinin ortalarinda danimarkali aktris connie nielsen ile cikmaya baslamistir.ciftin,lars'in skylar ile bosanmasindan sonra san francisco'da 21 mayis 2007'de bryce isimli bir cocuklari olmustur.nielsen'in ayni zamanda 1991 dogumlu sebastian adinda bir diger oglu daha vardir.ulrich ve nielsen 2012 yilinda ayrilmislardir.lars su anda manken jessica miller ile cikmaktadir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: ulrich ayni zamanda onemli bir sanat koleksiyoncusudur.babasi torben de ayni zamanda resim ve sanat tutkunudur.ulrich sanat ve muzik cevresinde buyumustur.bunlar hayatinin en onemli iki faktoru olmustur.metallica ile gecirdigi uzun tur donemleri sirasinda galeri ve muzeleri ziyaret eder.2002 yilinda verdigi bir roportajda sunlari soylemistir kendimi sanat dunyasinda kaybedecegimi ve muzik dunyasindan uzaklasabilecegimi dusundum.bu bana cok iyi bir saklanma alani oldu.".2008 yilinda stereo warning'e verdigi bir roportajda ise sunlari soylemistir ben buyurken evin her tarafinda sanat vardi.bu benim icin 20-25 yildir buyuk bir tutku.gidip kendim olabilecegim bir alan.bu metallica'nin bir parcasi olmamla ilgili degil.sanat cemberi icinde oldugum gibi kabul ediliyorum.sergi evleri,galeriler ve sanatci bulusmalarina gitmeye bayiliyorum.bu harika cunku metallica ile ilgili hicbir bagi yok.bu benim bagimsizlik bolgem ulrich ve metallica rock and roll hall of fame 2009'a davet edildiklerinde lars bu onuru yasayan ilk danimarkali kisi olmustu
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: andre ward ve mikkel kessler'in 21 kasim 2009 tarihindeki super six dunya boks sampiyonasindaki maclarinda kessler'i desteklemek icin tribunde bulunmustur
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: ulrich,noel gallagher in yakin arkadasi,ve eski grubu oasis'in fanidir.ulrich,2008 yilinda kokain'i birakma surecinde gallagher'in kendisine ilham kaynagi oldugunu soylemistir.ulrich ayni zamanda,herhangi bir tarihte gallagher'in simdiki grubu olan noel gallagher's high flying birds grubunda davul calma istegini de dile getirmistir
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: ulrich tama markasini tercih etmektedir.ulrich,tamamen imzali,komple bir davul seti ve zildjian zilleri,remo davul basliklari gibi imzali ve ozel uretim bir finish sahibi olan pek az davulcudan birisidir.tama ayni zamanda ulrich icin imzali bircok seri uretmistir.zildjian zillerini ve remo tom basliklarini tercih eder.sahneye her zaman bu ekipmanlarla cikmaktadir.sahnede bunlarin disinda ekipmanlarla gorundugu cok nadir olmustur.fakat studyoda aralarinda ludwig,gretsch ve sabian gibi markalarin bulundugu kombinasyonlar da kullanir.1994 yilinda easton ahead'e gecmeden once calato regal tip marka bagetlerin antlasmali sanatcisi idi.bu degisikligin sebebini ise ulrich,agac bagetler ile calarken bagetlerin kirilmasi olarak belirtmistir.daha sonra,studyoda bir elinde agac,bir elinde ise ahead bagetleri ile kayit yapmaya basladi.bunun sebebini ise,agac bagetlerin zillerden cikardigi sesi sevmesi olarak aciklamistir.gunumuzde de bu yontemi kullanmaktadir.bunun ardindan,tama ulrich icin iki farkli model ile lars ulrich imzali ozel trampet serisini uretmeye baslamistir.trampetlerin biri celik kaplamali,digeri ise tama'nin eskiden normal satis katalogundaki en pahali trampet olan can kaplamali trampet'tir.her iki trampet 14x6.5 olculudur
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: a perfect circle was the brainchild of billy howerdel who despite initially having a female voice in mind for the group decided to collaborate with friend maynard james keenan of tool as lead singer while tool were dealing with legal issues with their record label
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: howerdel had previously been the guitar tech for tool they were then joined by bassist violinist paz lenchantin guitarist troy van leeuwen formerly of failure and drummer tim alexander formerly of primus
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: after some rehearsals and warm up shows the band hit the studio
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: alexander was soon replaced however with session drummer and member of the vandals josh freese but his performance can still be heard on the album version of the song the hollow
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: judith the first single from the mer de noms album is about keenans's mother who suffered a stroke when he was 11 as heard in the song jimmy by tool
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the song renholder reads re:d.lohner backwards referring to danny lohner
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: after finishing their debut album mer de noms french for sea of names and playing a handful of shows in california they hit the road opening for nine inch nails on the 2000 fragility v2.0 tour
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: upon completion they embarked on a number of headlining tours all over the world and played the canadian touring festival summersault in the summer of 2000
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: when preparing for their second album apc lost two of its members paz lenchantin & troy van leeuwen
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: lenchantin left to join billy corgan's new band zwan while van leeuwen left to become the new guitarist for queens of the stone age
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: lenchantin however performed nearly all of the bass parts for the upcoming record
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: these two were soon replaced by ex marilyn manson bassist jeordie white formerly known as twiggy ramirez and guitarist danny lohner who had been involved in the production of both records thus far
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: however lohner didn't quite fit as a second guitarist and only performed on the track the noose on the second album so the band opted to leave touring duties to their newest addition former smashing pumpkins guitarist james iha
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the band released their second album thirteenth step on september 16 2003 and toured throughout north america europe and japan for the remainder of the year
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: in 2004 the band continued touring in australia japan new zealand and europe concluding touring in the late spring in the united states
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: a third album emotive was released on november 2 2004 which contains anti war cover songs of artists such as john lennon and joni mitchell
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: emotive was recorded with various different past and present members of the band but mostly by keenan and howerdel
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the song passive that appeared on the album was adapted from the defunct band tapeworm also known as the tapeworm project
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: tapeworm was essentially a project involving keenan trent reznor of nine inch nails and danny lohner
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the project never fully developed due to apparent contractual conflicts that could not be negotiated
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: during several shows on their tour in early 2001 a perfect circle played a cover of an unreleased tapeworm song then apparently titled vacant also referred to as perfect enemy
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the song was never released by any artist until it appeared on emotive as the song passive
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: on november 16 2004 the band released the dvd and cd set entitled amotion
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the set contains the music videos to the singles as well as some previously unreleased videos along with b sides and remixes
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the future of a perfect circle remains uncertain
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: they are currently on hiatus partly due to keenan's commitments with tool although many believed that a perfect circle was actually breaking up for good
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the band experienced a considerable amount of downtime during the recording release and tour for tool's previous album lateralus which made the band extremely dynamic in terms of its members
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: during the downtime other members of the band sought other projects which has meant that they are unavailable when a perfect circle is reformed
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: as for now keenan is touring with tool and working on his side project puscifer who are releasing a new album on october 30 2007
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: howerdel is planning a solo album
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: freese and white are touring with nine inch nails and iha is currently touring with vanessa and the o's in europe
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: freese is the current live drummer for nine inch nails and is still a member of the vandals who were supposedly gearing up for a new studio album but no plans for it have been revealed
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: he also tracked drum performances for black light burns which features ex limp bizkit guitarist/from first to last bassist wes borland on vocals and guitar danny lohner on bass and josh eustis of telefon tel aviv on keyboards
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: freese is not expected to tour with that lineup
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: he recently recorded drum tracks for the still unreleased solo debut of former korn guitarist brian head welch
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: freese is also scheduled to participate in the reunion of devo
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: iha was rumoured to join the reunion of the the smashing pumpkins but it did not happen and he is to begin recording his second solo album
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: keenan most recently said that he thinks a perfect circle is over for the foreseeable future
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: billy howerdel confirmed this by saying there were currently no plans for a new album or tour
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: the band's official website was updated september 19 2006 with the following message the sleeper must awaken peace
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: sorry it's been awhile since we've posted
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: been busy
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: billy is hard at work on his solo project and i'm on the road with tool working on the www.puscifer.com website and making wine in between all that
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: no telling when billy will be finished with his new material but what i've heard is very promising
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: i forgot to post lyrics for 13th step and emotive so i'll get on that soon
lines.name: Turkish

lines.value: 2001 ile 2004 yillari arasinda telegol programinda yorumculuk yapan ahmet cakar 25 subat 2004'te mecidiyekoy'de profilo alisveris merkezi'nin arkasinda bulunan hekimlik yaptigi saglik ocagindan cikarken vucuduna isabet eden bes kursunla vurulmustur
